resources.string: This app aims to provide a clear introduction in C. through short descriptions and code snippets. at the end of every tutorial you will find a link to a video discussion (in arabic). feel free to leave any feedback and happy coding.

First let's start with defining the term Database: is an ordered collection of data. so any data which is stored in an ordered manner can be named database.
What is DBMs?
Database management systems, is a software that is designed to model data and provide interaction with the user.
Introduction to MySQL
 1)Data is normally stored in one or more files.
2)Data is usually stored in tables.
 3)tables contain rows and columns.
4)Data can be cross-referenced among tables.
 Popular DBMS's:
MySQL
POstgreSQL
SQLite
Microsoft SQL server
Oracle
Maria DB.
 let's take a look at this table.

Database name: school
Table name: class1
 Columns / Fields: id, first_name, last_name, email.
Rows / records: 3 users.

Interacting with a Database:
here are some commands which we will be using through this tutorials when dealing with a database.
 Define
Create
Select
Query
Update
Delete

What is SQL?
Structured query language, is a special purpose programming language that allow developers to interact with the data in a database.
Data definition language(DDL): used to define data structure. ex:(create table, alter table).
Data manipulation language(DML): used to manipulate data itself ex:( insert, update, delete).
Perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete).
